trans-unit.source: Represents the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 表示公历。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.
trans-unit.target: 公历日历识别两个纪元： 公元前

trans-unit.source: or B.C.E., and A.D.
trans-unit.target: B.C.E.和公元或

trans-unit.source: or C.E.
trans-unit.target: 或基督纪元

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class recognizes only the current era (A.D.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类识别当前纪元 (A.D.

trans-unit.source: or C.E.).
trans-unit.target: 或公元）。

trans-unit.source: For information about using the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用信息<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by 4, unless it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 闰年公历日历中定义为一年，除非它是由 100 可被 4，整除。

trans-unit.source: However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不 1900 年是闰年，但 2000 年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days).
February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years.
trans-unit.target: 2 月有 29 天在闰年和 28 在平年。

trans-unit.source: By default, all <xref:System.DateTime> and <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values express dates and times in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，所有<xref:System.DateTime>和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值 express 中公历日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar was developed as a replacement for the Julian calendar (which is represented by the <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> class) and was first introduced in a small number of cultures on October 15, 1582.
trans-unit.target: 公历开发，作为罗马儒略历的替换 (这由<xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>类) 和上 1582 年 10 月 15，首次引入中少量的区域性。

trans-unit.source: When working with historic dates that precede a culture's adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the original calendar if it is available in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 当处理历史日期之前的公历的区域性的采用，应使用原始的日历，如果它是在.NET Framework 中可用。

trans-unit.source: For example, Denmark changed from the Julian calendar to the Gregorian calendar on February 19 (in the Julian calendar) or March 1 (in the Gregorian calendar) of 1700.
trans-unit.target: 例如，丹麦从更改罗马儒略历为公历日历年 2 月月 19 日 （在儒略历） 或 3 月 1 日 （公历） 中的 1700年上。

trans-unit.source: In this case, for dates before the adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the Julian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，对于之前的采用公历日期，应使用罗马儒略历。

trans-unit.source: However, note that no culture offers intrinsic support for the <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 但请注意任何区域性提供的内部支持<xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>类。

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> class as a standalone calendar.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>作为独立日历类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see .
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates that February 18, 1700 in the Julian calendar, which is the last day the Julian calendar was officially used in Denmark, is one day earlier than March 1, 1700 in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示 1700 年 2 月 18，罗马儒略历，即罗马儒略历正式丹麦中使用的最后一天中为早于 1700 在公历日历年 3 月 1，一天。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> supports a set of calendars.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>支持一组的日历。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A> property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A> property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A>属性返回区域性的默认日历和<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A>属性返回一个包含所有支持的区域性的日历数组。

trans-unit.source: To change the calendar used by a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>, the application can set the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改使用的日历<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，应用程序可以设置<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A>到新的属性<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A> ignores punctuation in abbreviated era names, only if the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> is selected in <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the culture uses "A.D."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.GetEra%2A> 仅当忽略缩写的纪元名称中的标点<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>中选择<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>并且区域性使用"公元"

trans-unit.source: as the era name, that is, "A.D."
trans-unit.target: 作为纪元名称，即"公元"

trans-unit.source: is equivalent to "AD".
trans-unit.target: 等效于"AD"。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows that <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> ignores the punctuation in the era name, only if the calendar is Gregorian and the culture uses the era name "A.D.".
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>忽略纪元名称中的标点，只有当日历为公历并且区域性使用的纪元名称"公元"。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> class using the default <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes> value is <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes.Localized>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes>值是<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes.Localized>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> is set to a <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> that is created with this constructor, the dates and times are localized in the language associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>设置为<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>创建使用此构造函数，与关联的语言中已本地化的日期和时间<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example prints a <xref:System.DateTime> using a <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> that is localized.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例输出<xref:System.DateTime>使用<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>的已本地化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> value that denotes which language version of the calendar to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> 值，指示要创建的日历的语言版本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> 枚举的成员。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to which to add months.
trans-unit.target: 将向其添加月数的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of months to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的月数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is the specified number of months away from the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 相距指定月数的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定月数添加到指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中时得到的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。

trans-unit.source: The year part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的年份部分<xref:System.DateTime>如果外部的指定年，则结果月份受到<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports only the current era.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持仅当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果所得年份未指定纪元，将引发<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的一天时间部分<xref:System.DateTime>保持与指定相同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定的月份是年 10 月，其中包含 31 天，指定的日期是该月第 31 天和的值`months`参数为 6，则结果年份是一个多个指定的年份，生成的月份是年 4 月，并生成 day 为 30 天，这是年 4 月的最后一天。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`months`参数是负数，生成<xref:System.DateTime>早于指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值始终等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`通过调用的参数<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>根据公历。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 生成的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 超出了支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="months" /> is less than -120000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="months" /> 小于 -120000。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="months" /> is greater than 120000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="months" /> 大于 120000。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to which to add years.
trans-unit.target: 将向其添加年数的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of years to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的年数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is the specified number of years away from the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 相距指定年数的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that results from adding the specified number of years to the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定年数添加到指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中时得到的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。

trans-unit.source: The month part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的月份部分<xref:System.DateTime>保持与指定相同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports only the current era.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持仅当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.ArgumentException>如果所得年份未指定纪元，将引发<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的一天时间部分<xref:System.DateTime>保持与指定相同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days.
trans-unit.target: 例如，年 2 月有 28 天，但在闰年时它有 29 天。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 28th day of February in the following year.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期是闰年 2 月 29 日和的值`years`为 1，则结果日期将是第二中下一年的年 2 月 28 日。

trans-unit.source: If `years` is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`years`为负，生成<xref:System.DateTime>早于指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值始终等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`通过调用的参数<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>根据公历。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> is outside the supported range.
trans-unit.target: 生成的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 超出了支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Represents the current era.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.
trans-unit.target: 公历日历识别两个纪元： 公元前

trans-unit.source: or B.C.E., and A.D.
trans-unit.target: B.C.E.和公元或

trans-unit.source: or C.E.
trans-unit.target: 或基督纪元

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class recognizes only the current era (A.D.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类识别当前纪元 (A.D.

trans-unit.source: or C.E.).
trans-unit.target: 或公元）。

trans-unit.source: This field always returns 1.
trans-unit.target: 此字段始终返回 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前日历是阳历、阴历还是二者的组合。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType.SolarCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType.SolarCalendar" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses reflection to instantiate each <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar> type found in the .NET Framework and displays the value of its <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用反射来实例化每个<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>类型在.NET Framework 中找到并显示的值其<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> value that denotes the language version of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> 值，该值指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 的语言版本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> value that denotes the language version of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> 值，该值指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 的语言版本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to determine the GregorianCalendar language version supported by the culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何确定支持的区域性的 GregorianCalendar 语言版本。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in a set operation is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 在设置操作中指定的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendarTypes" /> 枚举的成员。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在设置操作中，当前实例是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of eras in the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 中的纪元列表。

trans-unit.source: An array of integers that represents the eras in the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 中的纪元的整数数组。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.
trans-unit.target: 公历日历识别两个纪元： 公元前

trans-unit.source: or B.C.E., and A.D.
trans-unit.target: B.C.E.和公元或

trans-unit.source: or C.E.
trans-unit.target: 或基督纪元

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class recognizes only the current era (A.D.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类识别当前纪元 (A.D.

trans-unit.source: or C.E.).
trans-unit.target: 或公元）。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns an array with only one element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回包含仅有一个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the month in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的月中日期。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day of the month in <paramref name="time" />.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 31 之间的一个整数，用于表示 <paramref name="time" /> 中的月中日期。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>根据公历。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the week in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的周中日期。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> value that represents the day of the week in <paramref name="time" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> 值，用于表示 <paramref name="time" /> 中的周中日期。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DayOfWeek> values are Sunday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, and Saturday.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DayOfWeek>的值为星期一到星期日、 星期一、 星期二、 星期三、 星期四、 星期五、 之间。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>根据公历。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the day of the year in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的日期是该年中的第几天。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 366 that represents the day of the year in <paramref name="time" />.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 366 之间的一个整数，用于表示 <paramref name="time" /> 中的年中日期。

trans-unit.source: The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year.
trans-unit.target: 每年的日期被指从该年度的第一天的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A> for the first day of the first month returns 1, and <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A> for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A>对的第一个月的第一天返回 1，和<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A>上个月的最后一天返回该年中的天的总数，其中相同的值返回<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>根据公历。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定纪元中指定年份的指定月份中的天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified month in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 指定纪元中指定年份的指定月份中的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method returns 28 or 29 for February (`month` = 2), depending on whether `year` is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此方法返回 28 或 29，年 2 月 (`month` = 2)，具体取决于`year`是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: The following code example calls GetDaysInMonth for the second month in each of five years in each era.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例为每个五年中每个纪元中的第二个月份调用

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="month" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="month" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of days in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定纪元中指定年份的天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 指定纪元中指定年份的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method returns 365 or 366, depending on whether `year` is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此方法返回 365 或 366，具体取决于是否`year`是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: The following code example calls GetDaysInYear for five years in each era.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例为每个纪元中的五年调用 GetDaysInYear。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the era in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的纪元。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era in <paramref name="time" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示 <paramref name="time" /> 中的纪元。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C.
trans-unit.target: 公历日历识别两个纪元： 公元前

trans-unit.source: or B.C.E., and A.D.
trans-unit.target: B.C.E.和公元或

trans-unit.source: or C.E.
trans-unit.target: 或基督纪元

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class recognizes only the current era (A.D.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类识别当前纪元 (A.D.

trans-unit.source: or C.E.).
trans-unit.target: 或公元）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>根据公历。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify either <see cref="F:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.ADEra" /> or <see langword="GregorianCalendar.Eras[Calendar.CurrentEra]" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.ADEra" /> 或 <see langword="GregorianCalendar.Eras[Calendar.CurrentEra]" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

trans-unit.source: Always 0 because the Gregorian calendar does not recognize leap months.
trans-unit.target: 总为 0，因为公历无法识别闰月。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is less than the Gregorian calendar year 1 or greater than the Gregorian calendar year 9999.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 小于公历 1 年或大于公历 9999 年。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.ADEra" /> or <see langword="GregorianCalendar.Eras[Calendar.CurrentEra]" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.ADEra" /> 或 <see langword="GregorianCalendar.Eras[Calendar.CurrentEra]" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the month in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month in <paramref name="time" />.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示 <paramref name="time" /> 中的月份。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>根据公历。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of months in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定纪元中指定年份的月数。

trans-unit.source: The number of months in the specified year in the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 指定纪元中指定年份的月数。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例为每个纪元中的五年调用 GetMonthsInYear。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the year in the specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 中的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year in <paramref name="time" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示 <paramref name="time" /> 中的年份。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>根据公历。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 31 之间的一个整数，用于表示天。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中的指定日期是否为闰日。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期是闰日，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外的整除的年份。

trans-unit.source: However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不 1900 年是闰年，但 2000 年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 闰日是仅在闰年中发生了一天。

trans-unit.source: In the Gregorian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历的年 2 月 29 日是唯一的闰日。

trans-unit.source: The following code example calls IsLeapDay for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例调用每个纪元五年中第二个月 （年 2 月） 的最后一天 IsLeapDay。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="month" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="month" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="day" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="day" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified month in the specified year in the specified era is a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中指定年份的指定月份是否为闰月。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns <see langword="false" />, unless overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 除非被派生类重写，否则此方法始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外的整除的年份。

trans-unit.source: However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不 1900 年是闰年，但 2000 年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 闰月是仅在闰年中发生的整月。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian calendar does not have any leap months.
trans-unit.target: 公历没有闰月。

trans-unit.source: The following code example calls IsLeapMonth for all the months in five years in the current era.
trans-unit.target: 以下代码示例调用 IsLeapMonth 当前纪元中的五年中的所有每月。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="month" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="month" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified year in the specified era is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中的指定年份是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的年是闰年，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历闰年中，被指由 4 个，但如果它是由 100 可除外的整除的年份。

trans-unit.source: However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可被被 400 的年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不 1900 年是闰年，但 2000 年。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days.
trans-unit.target: 平 365 年天并且初始屏幕闰年有 366 天。

trans-unit.source: The following code example calls IsLeapYear for five years in each of the eras.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例调用 IsLeapYear 为五年中每个纪元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 类型支持的最晚日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> type, which is the last moment of December 31, 9999 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最新的日期和时间受<see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" />类型，即的那一刻年 12 月 31 日公元 9999 年

trans-unit.source: and is equivalent to <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于<see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取的最小值和日历的最大值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> type.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> 类型支持的最早日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The earliest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" /> type, which is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最早的日期和时间受<see cref="T:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar" />类型，即的那一刻 1 月 1 日公元 0001 年

trans-unit.source: and is equivalent to <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 它等效于<see cref="F:System.DateTime.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Although the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime%2A> property is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E., the Gregorian calendar was not introduced until October 15, 1582, and its adoption throughout the European continent and worldwide was slow.
trans-unit.target: 尽管的值<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime%2A>属性为的那一刻 1 月 1 日公元 0001 年，公历日历不引入之前 1582，年 10 月 15，并且其采用在欧洲 continent 和全球整个速度太慢。

trans-unit.source: Until they adopted the Gregorian calendar, most cultures in the European, American, and Australian continents used the Julian calendar, which is represented by the <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 大多数区域以欧洲、 American 和澳大利亚洲直到它们采用公历，使用儒略历，由表示<xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例获取的最小值和日历的最大值。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 31 之间的一个整数，用于表示天。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 23 that represents the hour.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 23 之间的一个整数，用于表示小时。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the minute.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 59 之间的一个整数，用于表示分钟。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 59 that represents the second.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 59 之间的一个整数，用于表示秒。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 to 999 that represents the millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 999 之间的一个整数，用于表示毫秒。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the era.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

trans-unit.target: 返回设置为指定纪元中指定日期和时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.
trans-unit.target: 设置为当前纪元中指定日期和时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="month" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.
trans-unit.target: 一个两位数或四位数的整数，用于表示要转换的年份。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax" /> property to determine the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax" /> 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

trans-unit.source: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of <paramref name="year" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <paramref name="year" /> 的四位数表示形式的整数。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> 是可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit `year` within that 100-year range.
trans-unit.target: 通过查找两位数字的唯一匹配项来确定世纪`year`该 100 年范围内。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>设置为 2029，则 100 年范围是从 1930年为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930，而 29 一个 2 位数字值被解释为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。

trans-unit.source: Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> value representing the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 将两位数年份值 (小于 100) 传递会导致方法的值转换为一个四位数字值根据<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>值，该值表示相应的纪元。

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>, the method returns the actual input value.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序提供在支持的日历范围到内的四位数年份值<xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>，该方法返回实际的输入的值。

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序提供一个四位数字值超出了支持的日历，或者它提供了负值，则该方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by the calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许两位数年份，要正确转换为 4 位数年份。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此属性设置为 2029年，100 年范围是从 1930年为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1930，而 29 一个 2 位数字值被解释为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的初始值被派生自控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的设置。

trans-unit.source: However, that information can change during the life of the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，该信息可以更改的生命周期内<xref:System.AppDomain>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>类不会检测系统设置中的更改自动。

trans-unit.source: The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应将此值设置为 99，以指示按字面解释 2 位数字的年份。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此属性设置为 99，100 年范围为 0 （不是有效值对于大多数日历而言） 和 99 之间。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 30。

trans-unit.source: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
trans-unit.target: 为设置操作指定的值小于 99。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The value specified in a set operation is greater than <see langword="MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" />.
trans-unit.target: 为设置操作指定的值大于 <see langword="MaxSupportedDateTime.Year" />。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 在设置操作中，当前实例是只读的。
